text: The Jefferson Davis Carr House in Fort Pierre, South Dakota was built in 1906. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1982. It is: "A somewhat rare surviving domestic building constructed of locally manufactured materials, the Jefferson Davis Carr House is significant as a local architectural landmark and as an example of early settlement patterns in Stanley County." title: Jefferson Davis Carr House
